subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: For the first time in his career,  Martin Truex, the lesser-known teammate of Dale Earnhardt Jr., has earned a spot in the 10-race Chase for the Nextel Cup playoff.
snippet: For the first time in his career,  Martin Truex, the lesser-known teammate of Dale Earnhardt Jr., has earned a spot in the 10-race Chase for the Nextel Cup playoff.
